title: Don't reload initial page on device rotation

title: Change intent type to show only email apps
message: Change intent type to show only email apps

title: Make downloads of generated files work
message:
Make downloads of generated files work

This is needed because they are only available to logged in users
and we have to send the authentication cookie and handle the rest

title: Take special care to mailto links
message: Take special care to mailto links

title: Change default WebView UserAgent
message:
Change default WebView UserAgent

This is needed for example to hide the persona login button, which does
not work in an app.

title: Start the app on the dashboard page
message:
Start the app on the dashboard page

This makes more sense that showing the features page that presents the
same info the users already read in the app store
